definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age

sentences.english: He was somewhere between a second father and an older brother to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，他扮演着一个介于父亲和兄长之间的角色。

sentences.english: She had a true sisterly feeling for her brother.
sentences.chinese: 她对兄长怀有真正的骨肉之情。

sentences.english: I am your friend and brother.
When RongTian etc, to manage to brother won idea to tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 当荣田等人手足无措时，至嬴主意向兄长说出真相。

sentences.english: When he has a big silver solution, and brother to eat his silver to make this leakage.
sentences.chinese: 他却几时有一锭大银解了，兄长吃他赚漏了这个银去。

sentences.english: His older brother, Kalan, was destined for the throne.
sentences.chinese: 他的兄长卡兰曾被指定为亲王继承人。

sentences.english: He himself told me that his brother John is a world-famous doctor.
sentences.chinese: 他本人对我讲，他的兄长约翰是一位世界闻名的大夫。

sentences.english: Miaka's older brother and Taka's college senpai.
sentences.chinese: 美朱的兄长，魏的大学前辈。

sentences.english: He would ascend to the throne after his brother abdicated (see following slide).
sentences.chinese: 他能在其兄长退位后加冕成为英王。

definition: older male cousin via female line
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch
crown prince/heir of a noble house
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
